name: Morozov-SH Arms Redshift
name_cn: 莫罗佐夫-SH臂甲 红移版
description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%
Temp. Rating: -97 / 121 °C
Featuring fortified armor plating, special anti-rip protective padding and ample storage, the Morozov-SH is ready to overcome all kinds of adversity. After consulting with security professionals, RRS added a unique high protective collar and a lightweight inner lining; making the Morozov-SH both comfortable and a battlefield stalwart.
description_cn:
物品类型：重型装甲
伤害减免：40%
防护温度: 物品类型：重型装甲
伤害减免：40%
防护温度: -95 / 120 °C
莫罗佐夫-SH拥有强化装甲、特殊的防撕裂保护垫和充足的储存空间，可以随时应对各种逆境。在咨询了专业安全人士后，RRS添加了独特的高防护领和轻质内衬，使莫罗佐夫-SH既舒适又坚固。
